column1: #text=My friend Adam and I decided to go to the flea market today because the weather was nice and we were hoping to take some random junk home with us .
#text=We walked around for a while , but nothing really caught our attention .
#text=We were looking for something special amount all this junk .
#text=Suddenly something caught my eye , it was an old Schwinn with a flat tire .
#text=The price was right so I decided to take it home with me .
#text=Fixing the flat tire was a trivial task , I could do it in my sleep .

#text=All I had to do was remove the brakes off the back wheel , then I needed to remove the wheel from the axle , next I would take the old tube off of the rim and replace it with the new one , lastly I would just put the tire back on the axle and reattach the brakes .
#text=With this little amount of effort I would have myself a brand new Schwinn .
